tweets.content: @rozavasileva: #iodc16 session on aligning #localopendata with national #opendata programs and global goals is starting now!pic.twitter.com/RtqiJy4pLW
@bcharagu: Global goals action group discussions...what are the #data roadmaps for SDGs... Interesting. #IODC16pic.twitter.com/s0AHcyoKSg

info: This main action session attracted a few attendees, so panelists and audience held an intimate discussion about the evolution of Sustainable Development Goals, focused on Data for Action. Aditya Agarwal (Technical Manager for the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development Data) moderated a panel with two panelists: Al Kags (The Open Institute), Laura Manley (Co-Founder and Director of Programs at Center for Open Data Enterprise) and Risenga Maluleke (Statistics South Africa)
conference_notes: After the four speeches, there was a further discussion with the audience who asked several questions regarding the messages speakers shared.
name: Global Goals
